channel.title: 317 delta: report system
channel.description:
Hey guys, do any of you know how I can set up a report abuse system so it would look something like.
'Playername1 has reported playername2 for rule 1'
Is it also possible to get it so staff members can see it only. I suppose the code would contain something like messageToAll but I would like it to moderators+.
(I've looked for tutorials can't find any that meets with what I want)

item.title: 317 delta: report system
item.dc:creator: @Thesancez Thesancez
item.description:
@Thesancez wrote:

GIve me server client…

Read full topic

item.title: 317 delta: report system
item.dc:creator: @dain_bramage dain bramage
item.description:
@dain_bramage wrote:

The packet id is 218. Should be fixed with a length of 10.

Long = Playername Byte = Rule Byte = Is the reporter a moderator.

I wouldn’t think there would be any tutorials for me to link you with, so that’s all I give really give you.

I might make a tutorial with full 60 second logging later…

Read full topic
